contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 2, 1975 D Manchester District Contest (Second Section)
Manchester District Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Manchester District Contest manchester-district-contest-second-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £25 and cup, 2nd £15 and cup, 3rd £10 and rose bowl. Contest ran as an experiment - all three sections played together in one pre-drawn contest with a choice of three test pieces per section. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 11, 2014, 9:59 a.m. Dec. 17, 2016, 10:21 a.m.
1 Radcliffe Brass Band Malcolm Brownbill Alice in Wonderland [Hanmer]
2 Congleton Brass Charles Cook Promenade
3 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band John Golland Promenade
4 Stacksteads Brass Band Alec Evans Promenade
5 British Aerospace (Chadderton) Charles Holt Alice in Wonderland [Hanmer]
6 Mossley Band H. D. Robinson Promenade
Withdrawn Blackley Band E. Atherton Promenade
